reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan's quality excellent and appreciate its style, with one noting its western/Native pattern. The sweater is extremely soft, very warm, and customers love its color, with one mentioning it's perfect for south Texas winters. They describe it as chic, comfortable, and well-fitting, though some note it runs a little small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have one or two of these in the wardrobe!
items.body: What an amazing cardigan! Soft and warm texture, beautiful colors and patterns, knee length, goes with any outfit, reasonably priced, and looks stylish. I am going to buy one more to give away as a gift. This is my second cardigan and this color is lovely; will go with many outfits. I am thinking of using an elastic stretchable belt in winter to wrap/hold it close to body a bit of additional warmth. Read more
items.author: KMJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS SWEATER! I wish I had it in every color! IT fits perfectly and looks expensive. Chic!
items.body: I am CRAZY about this sweater! I've never gotten so many compliments on anything and the colors are fabulous. I ordered the green but I'd love to have ever color, especially the turquoise blue. It's GREAT!! I wish I could give it more stars. The size is perfect (I wear a M) and the length is great for jeans, pants or even over a dress or skirt. The style is western/Native which I am always drawn to. It's PERFECT! Read more
items.author: Ginger Patterson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful
items.body: Wonderful love it nice and warm . 5'6 137 burgundy Ordered a large I usually wear a medium I was worried it might shrink like some comments mentioned. I haven't washed it yet so Compliments the first day I wore it Read more
items.author: Jen Waters

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Pretty
items.body: Review for: Women Boho Cardigan Aztec Open Front Long Sleeve Shawl Collar Sweater Coat I ordered a size XL. If that is your normal size, this will not fit you. Order 1 size larger and it should be fine. I had to give mine to my granddaughter, who is a S but likes larger things. It's a pink, but not a pink pink which makes it look so pretty. Very soft. I am sad that they don't come larger. 4 stars for not sizing correctly. Read more
items.author: NanaOF5

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of compliments
items.body: This is way better made than I expected, light but not too light, great for an overly air conditioned building. Cozy and flattering, everyone asks where I got it! Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't say enough good things
items.body: Omg amazing quality. Sooo beautiful. Incredibly soft. Just amazing. Im so happy i purchased. Love love love. Buy it you wont be disappointed Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater!
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater that is well made. Please note the grey is much lighter than the picture, almost white. Either way I love it and I ordered it in another color. Read more
items.author: Crista

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: Design is beautiful and feels like you are cloaked with a superb black that breathes. LOVE! Read more
items.author: Francine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pink, Blue, Burgundy, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
